name: Blazing Brass
description:
Welcome to the world of sand, steam and bronze constructions. Scrap is everything in these lands. Fight your way through the 1000 Foot Train, kill and destroy everything on your way and then call your brothers in crime to demolish the last wall between you and wealth.
• Fast paced action sidescrooller.
• Think fast to survive or fall behind this always moving machine.
• Rain death from above on your enemies.
• SMASH those crates!!!
• Control the train to set the final boss on fire and BOOOM!!!
